title: National Front pays eulogizing tributes to Burhan Wani, associates
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 08 (APP):Jammu Kashmir National Front has paid eulogizing tributes to Shaheed Burhan Muzaffar Wani and his associates on their martyrdom anniversary being held on 08 July.
In a statement issued here Tuesday, the JKNF spokesman Muhammad Haseeb Wani, while lauding the supreme sacrifices of the martyred commander and his other associates, said, ” Their unparalleled sacrifices for the freedom movement will serve as a beacon for coming generations”.
Terming Burhan Wani as the icon of resistance, he said, “Shaheed Burhan Wani left behind a proud legacy that will continue to inspire the Kashmir’s incoming generations”.
He said that Wani family has set a great example of courage and commitment towards the national cause.
Reiterating Kashmiris’ pledge to uphold the martyrs’ mission, Wani said that the people of Kashmir would continue their struggle till they achieve their cherished goal of freedom from India’s occupation.
